name: Ouch! (itch) (joneth)
description:
Controls:

left/right = move
x/y = shoot
up/down = change color

Idea:

Blast enemies, connect the same colors and create chain explosions to rack up points.

Present:

Enemy formation matrix works, chain explosion works, player/bullet/enemy collision works, color interaction works, some kind of scoring works, some music added. Runs at 60 fps in native mode.

Future:

Better scoring, better HUD, scoreboard, more music/sfx. More things as I come up with them.
